name: Peak (tyedye105)
description:
After bravely traveling alone to a cursed mountain peak, you wake up at the bottom of a cave.  Head empty, you press onward...

Learned a lot about RPG Maker on this one.  Definitely around the edges, but I've got some I'm proud off!

Also there is really no sounds outside of some SFX in the opening cut scene. DON"T GOT THE TIME TO MESS WITH THAT.

As per usual, any dosh thrown at me, goes back into the PIGSquad!
